Title: Authorizes alcoholic beverage licensees to confiscate written evidence of age which is false or fraudulent
Summary: Authorizes alcoholic beverage licensees to confiscate written evidence of age which is false, or fraudulent; provides such written evidence of age shall be delivered to the police for verification, and returned to rightful holder or destroyed.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to authorizing licensees to confiscate any written evidence of age, which is false, fraudulent or not the presenter's own, offered for the purpose of purchasing an alcoholic beverage
